name: Life/Game
description:
Description

"Life/Game" is a dialogue with the player, that goes beyond the gameplay and the monitor. Together with the hero, you will pass through a dangerous path known as "life". In the game, you will receive answers to the hero's question on the meaning of life (and maybe even answer your own questions). Maybe you will know the truth of being, or maybe just have fun with the game, who knows?

Controls:

Move        A/D ←/→

Crouch    S/↓

Jump        W/↑/Space

Run           Left Shift

Fire           X/Right Ctrl

Credits:

Programmer                                     Mikhail Eremin

Artist/Game designer                 Sergey Ushakov

Composer/Sound designer     Polka Bedlam

daScript/dasbox by Gaijin Entertainment
